description.value:
You utter an arcane word of power that can make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] upon hearing it. Once targeted, the target is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. The effect of the spell depends on the target's level.

11th or Lower The target is Blinded permanently.

12th-13th The target is Blinded for [[/r 1d4 #minutes]]{1d4 minutes}.

14th or Higher The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The levels at which each outcome applies increase by 2.
